column4: For someone so involved with computers, I don't really do anything fancy with them. Just surf the web, really. :). No gaming,
I was hoping that there would be some projects out there that would have different purposed forks of Ubuntu (or whatever).
Fat momma install, then slim install, then micro install.
It was surprising to see such a lightning boot-up and OS
mini is basically Debian's net-install with Ubuntu repos
